channel.title: Tutorial Server Project
channel.description:
*This is not a Development Team*
[center][i]Tutorial Server[/i][/center] [center]By b b0yz 4[/center]
*`jeba already posted this, and I asked him if I could take it over and he said yes*
What the Tutorial Server is: This project is going to be a server that is basically a big tutorial to teach the "Noobs" to learn how to code Czar. I have already got the Base, and it is the Figment F2PPkz. I have also started it too.
Here are the updates so far, and what I am going to do: -Explain how to make NPCs talk in a conversation -Explain how to makes doors open and close with doors.java -Explain how to make NPCs -Explain how to make and change NPC's drops -Explain how to make fishing work (Item on NPC or object) -Explain how to make Other skills work.
If anyone has any other ideas please post.
If you want to talk to me add me on MSN: bradley.hoffman@live.com
Updates: -Working doors and gates -Have all NPCs in Tutorial Island -Have Dialogue for all NPCs (They need some more work though)

item.title: Tutorial Server Project
item.dc:creator: @b_b0yz_4 b b0yz 4
item.description:
@b_b0yz_4 wrote:

Chiizu:

ooo could u explain how to make food heal more??? I want to make super cheese lol

Did you download the old source? And if so I will explain it more. That part was `jeba’s work. I only helped fixed the doors, and showed him how to add dialogue.

So basically just some dialogue?

And in some ways yes, but when I finish it then someone downloads it. It won’t be like dialogue when you finish the whole server.

Read full topic

`jeba already posted this, and I asked him if I could take it over and he said yes

What the Tutorial Server is: This project is going to be a server that is basically a big tutorial to teach the “Noobs” to learn how to code Czar. I have already got the Base, and it is the Figment F2PPkz. I have also started it too.
